---
title: "ReadBestUse.Rmd"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
load("best.use.2013.RData")
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)
AllTracks.df = tbl_df(best.use)
C1 = AllTracks.df %>% 
  filter(WmaxS >= 34) %>%
  group_by(SYear) %>%
  summarize(nTS = length(unique(Sid)))
C2 = AllTracks.df %>%
  filter(WmaxS >= 64) %>%
  group_by(SYear) %>%
  summarize(nH = length(unique(Sid)))
AnnualCounts.df = merge(C1, C2)     
write.table(AnnualCounts.df, "AnnualCounts.txt")
```
